props.name: nbf
props.helpText: Users cannot join a meeting in this room before this time. If not set, the user will be able to join a room as soon as it is created.

props.name: exp
props.helpText: Users cannot join a meeting in this room after this time. If not set, the room will never expire.

props.name: enable_prejoin_ui
props.helpText: Determines whether participants enter a waiting room with a camera, mic, and browser check before joining a call. Options are true and false.

props.name: enable_chat
props.helpText: Determines whether chat is enabled. Options are true and false.

props.name: owner_only_broadcast
props.helpText: Options are true and false. If set to true, only meeting owners are allowed to turn on camera, unmute mic, and share screen. You can configure a meeting owner token with the Create meeting token button.

props.name: enable_knocking
props.helpText: Turns on a lobby experience for private rooms. A participant without a corresponding meeting token can request to be admitted to the meeting with a 'knock', and wait for the meeting owner to admit them. Options are true and false.

props.name: start_video_off
props.helpText: When participants first join a meeting, keep their camera off. This property can be overridden by a meeting token.

props.name: start_audio_off
props.helpText: When participants first join a meeting, keep their microphone muted. This property can be overridden by a meeting token.
